Join Ordering

  • ëª¨ë“  relation r1,r2,r3r_1, r_2, r_3r1â€‹,r2â€‹,r3â€‹ì— ëŒ€í•´ (r1â‹ˆr2)â‹ˆr3=r1â‹ˆ(r2â‹ˆr3)(r_1 \bowtie r_2) \bowtie r_3 = r_1 \bowtie (r_2 \bowtie r_3)(r1â€‹â‹ˆr2â€‹)â‹ˆr3â€‹=r1â€‹â‹ˆ(r2â€‹â‹ˆr3â€‹) (Join Associativity)
